mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.phone, u.card_no, u.enterprise, u.sex, u.head_image, u.is_delete from inno72_check_user u WHERE u.is_delete=0 and ( u.name LIKE '%${keyword}%' or u.phone LIKE '%${keyword}%' or u.enterprise LIKE '%${keyword}%) ORDER BY u.update_time DESC
SELECT count(1) from inno72_check_user u WHERE u.is_delete=0 and u.card_no=#{cardNo}

SELECT u.id, u.name, u.phone, u.card_no, u.enterprise, u.sex, u.head_image, u.is_delete, m.id AS machine_id, CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, if(area.circle='其他','',area.circle),IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,""), '—', m.machine_code ) AS machine_code from inno72_check_user u LEFT JOIN inno72_check_user_machine um ON um.check_user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = um.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.code = l.area_code WHERE u.is_delete=0 AND u.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code FROM inno72_admin_area a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.machine_code, m.id, locale.area_code FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale locale ON locale.id = m.locale_id ) m ON LEFT ( m.area_code,#{num}) = LEFT ( a.CODE,#{num}) WHERE a.parent_code = #{code} a.LEVEL = #{level}

SELECT m.id AS CODE, '' AS parent_code, CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district, if(area.circle='其他','',area.circle),IFNULL( locale.mall,""),IFNULL( locale.name,""), '—', m.machine_code ) AS NAME, area.province, area.city, area.district, area.circle, '5' AS LEVEL FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale locale ON m.locale_id = locale.id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = locale.area_code WHERE locale.area_code=#{code}

SELECT icu.phone, im.machine_code as machineCode FROM inno72_machine im LEFT JOIN inno72_check_user_machine cum ON im.id = cum.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_check_user icu ON cum.check_user_id = icu.id WHERE im.machine_code = #{machineCode}
